title: Gospel Companion
description: A cutting-edge digital assistant designed to enhance the experience of studying bible lessons and gospel materials.

title: Tweetteer
description: A clone of the popular social media platform, X (formerly, Twitter), pre-Elon, built using the MERN stack.

title: Todo
description: A full-stack application which allows users to create and modify tasks. Users can also filter tasks and select their preferred color theme.

title: Space Tourism
description: A multi-page website showcasing basic information about a space travel agency.

title: Compress IPv6 Address
description: A tool that converts IPv6 addresses from the preferred format to the compressed format.

title: Rock, Paper, Scissors

title: Where In The World?
description: A simple web application which displays real-time information about the countries of the world.

title: Advice Generator
description: A single-page website that autogenerates random advice with the Advice Slip API.

title: URL Shortener
description: Online tool that accepts long website URLs and generates shortened links that are shareable and easy to remember.

title: Calculator
description: A simple calculator that performs basic arithmetic operations.
